review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Item 19 ResizeObserver: replaces transitionend+300ms fallback and window resize listener with per-pane ResizeObserver on .pane-terminal containers. 50ms debounce focused, 200ms background. Integration verified: renderer.js removals clean, tabs.js handleResize backward compat maintained, observer setup after terminal init (no race), cleanup on kill/freshStart. ResizeObserver mock added for jsdom. Confidence HIGH.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
